title: Do any of our local television stations plan to offer the new TV network MeTV on their secondary channels? The network features great classic TV shows similiar to the RTV network on WWAY. (The closest station which carries this great network is WITN 7.2 in Washington NC, out of range for those of us in New Hanover and Brunswick counties.)
text:
Unfortunately we can't answer speculative questions about services or
retail developments at MyReporter.com. If such a service or
development is announced, it will be reported in the StarNews and at
StarNewsOnline.com.
